author: Staff Reporter
text:
Mahalingapuram Police arrested Vijayakumar (25) and Manikandan (27) on Monday on charges of murdering their relative R. Thangavel (50), a daily wage earner of Sadaiygounden Pudur near Pollachi.

The victim was found dead in his house on Sunday afternoon with injuries on his forehead, neck and hands.

His wife and daughter, who had gone out of town, found him dead at his house on returning on Sunday afternoon and told his mother Arukani Ammal. Based on a complaint from Arukani Ammal the case was first registered as suspicious death. Inquiry revealed that he was attacked by his two nephews on Thursday when his wife Pushpaveni and daughter went out of town on Thursday.
title: Two held for murdering relative
